rules_text:
At the beginning of your end step, create an Aether token. [i](It's an enchantment with “Sacrifice two Aether: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Flow – {2}, Sacrifice an Aether: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](Each creature you tap while activating this pays for {1}.)[/i]
